Module c195.c195wgu
Package helper

Class AppointmentsDAO

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentsDAO
public class AppointmentsDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing and querying appointments from the database. Provides CRUD operations for appointments and specific functionalities like checking overlapping appointments.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments from the database and populates them into an observable list.
      Returns:
      An observable list containing all appointments.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentId)
      Deletes an appointment based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the delete operation.

    • hasOverlappingAppointments

      public static boolean hasOverlappingAppointments(LocalDateTime newStartDateTime, LocalDateTime newEndDateTime, int customerId, int appointmentIdToExclude)
      Checks for overlapping appointments based on provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      newStartDateTime - Start time of the new appointment.
      newEndDateTime - End time of the new appointment.
      customerId - Customer ID to check for overlaps.
      appointmentIdToExclude - Appointment ID to exclude from the overlap check.
      Returns:
      True if there are overlapping appointments, False otherwise.

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(Appointments appointment)
      Updates an existing appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object with updated details.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the update operation.

    • insertAppointment

      public static int insertAppointment(Appointments appointment)
      Inserts a new appointment into the database.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object to be inserted.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

    • getUpcomingAppointmentsWithin15Minutes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getUpcomingAppointmentsWithin15Minutes()
      Retrieves appointments from the database that are within the next 15 minutes of the current local time.
      Returns:
      An observable list containing the upcoming appointments.
